metadata.title: CVE-2024-0397 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A defect was discovered in the Python “ssl” module where there is a memoryrace condition with the ssl.SSLContext methods “cert_store_stats()” and“get_ca_certs()”. The race condition can be triggered if the methods arecalled at the same time as certificates are loaded into the SSLContext,such as during the TLS handshake with a certificate directory configured.This issue is fixed in CPython 3.10.14, 3.11.9, 3.12.3, and 3.13.0a5.
